Html:
I have recently been looking at AngularJs, and obviously wanted to use TypeScript as my main toolset.
Working through the tutorials on the angular site, I quickly found a number of discrepancies between standard JavaScript development, and TypeScript / Visual Studio development - particularly on the unit testing and debugging front.
To this end I have put together a blog on how to setup an AngularJs / TypeScript / Visual Studio / development environment - complete with TypeScript debugging of the app, unit tests and e2e tests.
As per usual, and comments / suggestions / discussions would be much appreciated.
Setting up TypeScript and AngularJs in Visual Studio 2013.
